title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description:
Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)

Currently, when updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case). During this process, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the update is in progress.

NOTES:
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case).
